topics.body:
playing sonic adventure. god this game is janky garbage and I love it. 

although I have to wonder what it is that makes it okay when this game does it as opposed to sonic 06. I legitimately think the adventure games are designed way better but are also a product of their time. When they came out it was okay for a 3d game to be super janky because nobody knew how to do 3d games. If not for mario 64, sonic adventure would probably be seen as one of the most ambitious early 3d games.
